alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bradford, southeastern Baker, northeastern Union, northwestern Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Bryceville to near Keystone Heights. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, Kingsley, Sampson, Camp Blanding, Lawtey and Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
